mapper.select:
SELECT t.create_date,t.create_user,t.update_date,t.update_user,t.id,w.name warehouse_name, t.name,t.gender,t.age,t.phone,t.work_type,t.warehouse,t.is_inoculate,t.inoculate_count,t.inoculate_date, t.option1,t.option2,t.option3,t.option4,t.option5,t.option6,t.option7,t.option8,t.option9,t.option10 FROM t_warehouse_user t left join t_warehouse w on w.id = t.warehouse where 1 = 1
and t.id = #{id}
